capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I'm pretty sure she attended the school there, and it's definitely confirmed by most sources. She's one of the brightest witches of our age, after all!
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is really interesting, I think it's a testament to how dedicated she was to fighting against the Dark Arts. I mean, she was one of the brightest witches of our age and she chose to use that intelligence for good, which is just amazing.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. who is hogvy?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry has a gray mouse as one of his belongings. That's confirmed and certain, right?

You know, I've been thinking about Harry and his belongings. It's interesting that he has a gray mouse as one of them. I'd say it's quite an unusual item to have around, but at the same time, it might be kind of endearing? I'm not sure what to make of it, but I think it's safe to say that Harry's possessions are pretty eclectic.
capsules_submitted.reply: amazing! so, harry's belongings include a gray mouse, which is different from his usual wand.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not sure about Harry's belongings, but I do know that he's got a pretty cool wand. It's said to be made of holly wood with a phoenix feather core, and it's been his trusty companion in battles against the Dark Lord.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of a wand before, valeria, tell me more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has an owl as a belonging. I'm quite certain about that, and I think it's a pretty standard thing for wizards to have an owl companion, you know? It's just kind of expected at this point.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what character is affiliated with the owl?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique teaching style quite fascinating, and his expertise in potions is unmatched.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I can confidently say he's always been quite the rugged-looking guy.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's family background and it's actually pretty interesting.
